reasonCode: Laxative for constipation, works by softening the stools and also assists by stimulating the gut to achieve bowel movements.

reasonCode.text: Laxative for constipation, works by softening the stools and also assists by stimulating the gut to achieve bowel movements.

note.text: Take with a glass of fluid. May take 2-3 days for maximum effect. Do not take with laxatives containing liquid paraffin. Abdominal discomfort, nausea and rash may.

dosage.text: Take two tablets in the morning and in the evening
